entry.title: kacos2000/WinEDB
entry.summary:
Windows.EDB Browser

WinEDB

Windows.EDB Browser

==> Latest version <==

  • The stand-alone x64 command line tool WindowsEDB-to-CSV.exe or it's equivalent Powershell script WindowsEDB-to-CSV.ps1 will split the contents of the "SystemIndex_PropertyStore" table to multiple CSVs as seen on the image below:

Some stats:
---------------------------
Database size: 2.950.692.864
GUI     - Processing finished in: 09:33:33 (H:M:S)
PS1/EXE - Processing finished in: 04:39:12 (H:M:S)
Previous version of ps1 finished in: 18:25:05 (H:M:S)
---------------------------

Dependencies:

  • .NET Framework 4.8
  • Powershell Version: 5.1
  • Uses Microsoft.Isam.Esent.Interop (it is encoded+compressed, but can be exported). I recommend using JetBrains dotPeek with Esent.Interop.dll or the latest release of ManagedEsent to get more info on the structures

--> for research purposes :)
